meanings.sent1: The bird oviposited its eggs in the nest.
meanings.sent2: The fish oviposited its eggs in the water.
meanings.sent3: The chicken oviposited its eggs in the flowerpot by mistake.
meanings.sent4: The spider oviposited its eggs in the unsuspecting prey.
meanings.sent5: The lizard carefully oviposited its eggs in the warm sand.

meanings.sent1: The insect oviposited its eggs under a leaf.

meanings.sent5: The frog oviposited its eggs in the pond, creating new life.
